tests.custom: text | removeQuotes | split("nonce=") | last | split(" ") | first
text | removeQuotes | split("_csrf") | at(1) | split("value=") | at(1) | split(" ") | first
text | removeQuotes | split("csrf-token") | at(1) | split("content=") | at(1) | split(">") | first
